author: desruisseaux
msg: 'validate()' method now return a DataQuality report instead than throwing an exception when a property does not met the constraints.

msg: YARN-1861. Fixed a bug in RM to reset leader-election on fencing that was causing both RMs to be stuck in standby mode when automatic failover is enabled. Contributed by Karthik Kambatla and Xuan Gong.
